title: Butterflies are...
brief_description: Two students observe butterflies in their natural habitats in order to learn more about them. Contrasts the belief that insects can be studied by simple observation with the idea that it is necessary to kill and preserve insects in order to gain scientific knowledge about them. Suitable for upper primary level.
